casebody.data:
IN RE POLIZZI 2018-0777 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

Sua sponte, Anthony John Polizzi Jr., Attorney Registration No. 0090170, last known business address in North Royalton, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before July 9, 2018.
